attributes.action: Make the BST clock date earlier in Spring - on last Sunday in February or first in March
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the clocks go back on the last Sunday of October - 7weeks before the shortest day
BUT don't go forward until last Sunday of March - 13 or 14weeks after shortest day.

CHANGE this to be on the last Sunday in February or first Sunday in March.

Giving 4 months Greenwich Mean Time and 8 months British Summer Time.

It would have the benefit of always being BST before EASTER for school holidays.

If people can manage daylight time in October they can manage same daylight time in March.

It will make Winter seem shorter and Spring arrive before Easter.
